text:
At @CNN's #TexasTownHall, Beto outlines 4 steps we can take on health care:
1. Expand Medicaid
2. Introduce Medicare to the exchanges 
3. Use our bargaining power to bring down the costs of prescriptions 
4. Get to universal, guaranteed care for every child, woman, and man

html: And if we want to recruit the best into education, we have to treat our retired teachers like the public servants they are. That means putting an end to the Windfall Elimination Provision, increasing TRS resources, and securing more affordable health care.
